Intercepted message 8682292215280109387686387800941408274647817114432200348198305217267623420613727710088303372538589999832431661372224460871814650191477131998454451200022668 uses an RSA public key with modulus as a Blum integer. Exploit this vulnerability to uncover the secret.

n=10344590299670602926542803270169759822385124462400844888586743662137829964274775219708121641196632508167128119263727440301914722575325744748467353727794353, e=5442073779807981827255821477646152449690163143481453248980525676795524993705295938185209111418219575304917858796656413030953346814000268336332954184539349

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{evhbc51t}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 8682292215280109387686387800941408274647817114432200348198305217267623420613727710088303372538589999832431661372224460871814650191477131998454451200022668
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=10344590299670602926542803270169759822385124462400844888586743662137829964274775219708121641196632508167128119263727440301914722575325744748467353727794353, e=5442073779807981827255821477646152449690163143481453248980525676795524993705295938185209111418219575304917858796656413030953346814000268336332954184539349
The lower 104 bits of p are: 64369181495210433745848076340678556259

extra_info: p=106390700460445132047914358579930043164258862032650663258295907559534538979939, q=97232091290879370215808223533517372027852132258300348214274419034826071224027, Ï†(n)=10344590299670602926542803270169759822385124462400844888586743662137829964274571596916370316694368785585014671848535329307623771563853174421872993117590388
